author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Enjoy some warming food and drink this winter with Taste of London WinterTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Enjoy some warming food and drink this winter with Taste of London Winter Published  
Taste of London Winter returns to Tobacco Dock from November 19 till November 22. So, escape the cold of winter and enjoy some warming food and drink.The festive edition of the popular restaurant festival Taste of London, this foodie wonderland offers a huge range of tasty morsels to get the taste buds excited.
 
Set within the atmospheric Victorian splendour of the dock, the festival offers food lovers the chance to sample the signature dishes and wintry specials of the capital’s finest restaurants including Hix, Tom’s Kitchen, Club Gascon and Tredwell’s.
 
Packed with food stalls, demonstrations, talks, tastings and live music, visitors can indulge in everything from chocolate, wine and cheese sampling to cooking masterclasses with renowned chefs such as Tom Kerridge, Monica Galetti and Marcus Wareing.
